tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Harvard University: rejected commercial
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
Not sure what you want to do once you graduate from your exclusive prep school? Let our informational video commercial help you make the right decision for your future.
Featuring Elaine Loh of TV's "sitcoms."
Visit http://backoftheclass.net for more. Follow us: http://twitter.com/backoftheclass Become a Facebook fan: http://j.mp/8u5Xbk

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: haha I saw an ad for﻿ ecpi on the video I watched after this
All I saw was a lot of big Ego's ﻿
Developed and﻿ uploaded for Mitt Romney
educating﻿ the rich since .... ?
Looks like an intro of﻿ a gay porno
Looks﻿ like Winklevoss.
I love how the majority of the kids there﻿ were asian...... 0:20
lol﻿ unabomber
0:21﻿ lol Asians, typical
awesome!!! ﻿

50K a semester isn't expensive. Heck even a burger flipper can go to Harvard if he﻿ save and invest for ten years...and still have spare change left after graduation. That not much if you considered the inflation rate in Massachusetts. Tuition is not going to kill you but the rent, the cost of living, and the cost of parties will.
One of﻿ the courses is time... wth?
Great joke! It's so well done that you may think it's serious, but then you realize it's just a joke! :-) I loved it. Was it made﻿ by Yale students?
Call 1800-HARVARD to get your free﻿ brochure today... Free Trial for 30 days!
Harvard﻿ doesn't need an advertisement ... and especially this one !

JESUS CHRIST IS LORD -
Everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will﻿ be saved - Ask Jesus Christ to save you, ask Jesus Christ to bless you ! Glory to JESUS CHRIST
LOL!!! ﻿
...aanndd president﻿ of the United States
This was hilarious.﻿
Harvard never should have rejected this﻿ commercial
ASIANS!﻿
hilarious ﻿
I'm pretty sure﻿ that's God's title.
Choose from﻿ many exciting careers: social networking pioneer, unabomber, retired millionaire
Unabomber is a party foul﻿

Reviewer.Job: I eat Jersey Cast members and burn them with my colon. While some days I choose to light planets on fire

Reviewer.Movies: The Walking Dead tv series, CSI Miami, and other shows.
